Name: Exit Caf√©
Review Text:
For me, it is the perfect cafe... they serve very good shisha and drinks, while I get the freedom to order any food from outside (they don't serve food).
Prices are very reasonable, and they have a nice outdoor area in the good weather.

Name: Exit Caf√©
